definitions.title: adj. gent.
definitions.body: c. art. Nahum the Elkoshite Na 1:1 (perhaps = from Elkosh, but locality unknown; identified by Jer:Comm. with a village Elcesi in Galilee; cf. also Capernaum (= [[כְּפַר נַחוּם]] ?); others (improbably) with an Elkosh on E. bank of Tigris, near Mosul).
